# Summary

<!-- Describe what this PR does and why. Include any relevant context. -->

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI / tooling change
- [ ] Refactor (no functional change)

## Checklist

- [ ] `ansible-lint` passes with no errors
- [ ] Molecule tests pass (`molecule test`)
- [ ] Argument specs updated if role variables changed
- [ ] README updated if behaviour or variables changed
- [ ] CHANGELOG entry added under `[Unreleased]`
